txt.en: Defend the winch while the winch operator raises the Great Gate for Aragorn's force.
Rout the pillagers throughout Pelargir on the way to joining Aragorn at the piers.
Reach the winch to the Great Gate so it can be opened for Aragorn's force.
Hold Aragorn's flank as he confronts the main Corsair host.
The Oathbreakers have swept over the Corsair host, driving them back in supernatural terror.
Reach the winch to the Great Gate
Elrohir and Elladan must survive the battle

The Corsairs waste time sacking Pelargir. Sneak into the city  with an advance party and clear a path for Aragorn's gathered host.

Merit Rating

This quest starts with <rgb=#FFFF00>empty</rgb> Merit Rating.

<rgb=#FF0000>Gain Merit from:</rgb>
- Keep defenders alive
- Keep the Gate Winch from taking damage
- Defend citizens
- Defend resources
- Build and defend siege weapons
- Defeat Epic Foes quickly
